name: Wingate by Wyndham Vienna/Parkersburg

reviews.title: Great Hotel
reviews.text: I had the best experience at this hotel. I have finally found a place for our business clients that I feel comfortable sending them to. We will be back for sure! Staff was wonderfull++

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a wonderful room for a wonderful price...the first time we've stayed in a wingate. it won't be the last. everything about it was super..the room was quality and sparkling clean...the beds extremely comfortable..great water pressure in the shower...good continental breakfast. it was a little hard to find, but well worth the drive "off the beaten path". We're still singing it's praises a week later.
reviews.title: Great quality for budget price
Great hotel in unconventional location
reviews.text: We were surprised to find a hotel room of this quality in a suburban parking lot location! The room was beautifully decorated and immaculately maintained. The staff was friendly and helpful and the continental breakfast was good. Since I travel here often, I've stayed at most hotels within a 50 mile radius. While it doesn't have the ambiance of the Blennerhassett, it's much more convenient and a much better value. It will definitely be my choice in the future.

reviews.title: Very Fine Wingate Inn
reviews.text: The Wingate Inn opened within the last year on Grand Central Blvd. near the mall. Actually, it sits behind a strip shopping center and next to a Lowes. Obviously, being new, it is an extremely clean property with very nice appointments. Service was quite helpful and the pool area and exercise room were more than acceptable. Bathrooms were large and well lighted and quite frankly I cannot think of anything negative to say about this hotel. However, if you want a historic hotel experience, the Blennerhasset, in downtown Parkersburg is superior. Fine dining and Starbucks there too... but pricier than the Wingate. You can't go wrong with either choice in Parkersburg, WV.

This is a new property that is in somewhat of an unusual location for leisure travel but fine if you have business in the area. It is essentially behind a shopping center and adjacent to a big box home store. The rooms are large, free high speed internet, free continental breakfast and pleasing interior. It is near a "main drag" with numerous restaraunts, stores, and a shopping mall. So especially for business, this is a nice, convenient location, if you need to be in the Marietta/Parkersburg area.
reviews.title: Nice hotel and good value

reviews.text: This hotel just opened, so I wanted to give it a try. I am very happy that I did! They took great care of me. My room was spotless and had the amenities I needed. I was very comfortable staying here and as a business traveler, appreciated and enjoyed all the little extras they provided. The conference room was perfect for my meetings. I will definitely stay here whenever I travel to town and will refer others in my company to stay here, as well. Great job!
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Very nice beds, and when my power goes out, this is the place I stay. I pass 5 hotels and drive 30 minutes to get here. It is back out of the way, and it is clean.
reviews.title: Nicest in Parkersbur/Vienna area
Was my home for three months
reviews.text: Wingate became my home during my stay in Parkersburg. It was everything I could ask for. The best part about this place was the location. It proved to be perfect for all my needs since it was located close to many restaurants, Walmart, the Vienna mall, etc. Facility wise, this place has what is expected such as a gym, a 24/7 coffee machine, a business center and a laundry facility. However, the treadmill in the gym was not in very good shape. The complimentary breakfast is satisfactory but it gets repetitious for long stays. I paid $65 a night which I found reasonable but this was offered through a corporate deal.

We visited this hotel in the middle of a snowstorm and ended up having to stay an extra night. I am so glad that we liked this hotel as well as we did! The location was admittedly unusual, but it was convenient to lots of restaurants and shopping. The rooms were fairly big, the beds were comfy, the staff was friendly, the pool area was definitely nicer than most other hotels', and the breakfast was fantastic! We would absolutely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great price

reviews.text: I have stayed several times at this hotel because my business brings me to Vienna and Parkersburg. The hotel itself is located in a mall setting, across the parking lot of the mall is Loews and some other discount stores. That may be a good or a not romantic thing depending on the purpose of your visit.
reviews.title: Good Value But Staff Steals

reviews.text: The rooms are relatively clean and the hotel is not overcrowded. They have a storage where customers who can keep their valuable items for safety. What happens it that they go through your stuff and steal items from your bag or whatever it is. Twice it happened to me and I took it up with the front desk and they told me there was nothing they could do about it. They were actually not surprised. So I asked for the manager, they told me that the manager is not around (9 15 am) and that he would give me a call. I was never called back and I asked for the manager again and again, until I met a stone wall. Your property is not safe in the room and there are signs everywhere telling you that.
reviews.title: Best hotel in the area, by far!

likes.liked: — Great staff with a caring attitude
likes.disliked: — Next to a Lowes shopping center

description: Our Wingate by Wyndham Vienna Parkersburg hotel is the perfect blend of modern convenience and country charm. Centrally located minutes from downtown off Interstate 77, our non-smoking Parkersburg, WV, hotel near Grand Central Mall is designed to make your trip simple. Each morning, wake up to free hot breakfast and refresh with a swim in our indoor pool. Stay active with a workout in our fitness center, and relax your tension away in our spa. Stretch out in the comfort of your spacious hotel room and watch your flat-screen TV or use free Wi-Fi Internet access to plan your day. Kids 17 and under stay free with an adult.
